get.summary: Searches for devices using the query information provided.

parameters.name: lgid
parameters.description: OrganizationGroup to be searched, user's OG is considered if not sent.

parameters.name: seensince
parameters.description: Specifies the date filter for device search, which retrieves the devices that are seen after this date

parameters.name: sortorder
parameters.description: Sorting order. Values ASC or DESC. Defaults to ASC.

patch.summary: New - Check out the device to enrollment User

get.summary: Returns the details of the Devices which are Product Compliant .

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identfier of the Product of which ProductCompliant Device details needs to be retrieved.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Maximum results which should be returned in each page.

get.summary: Returns the details of the Device for which Provisioning is In-Progress.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identfier of the Product of which ProductCompliant Device details needs to be retrieved.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Maximum results which should be returned in each page.

get.summary: Returns the details of the Device for which Provisioning is Failed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identfier of the Product of which ProductCompliant Device details needs to be retrieved.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Maximum results which should be returned in each page.

get.summary: Returns the details of the Device for which Provisioning is Assigned.

parameters.name: seensince
parameters.description: Filters devices such that devices with last seen after this date will be returned.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Maximum results which should be returned in each page.

get.summary: Gets Device Profile Details identified by the Profile Id

post.summary: Creates an APPLE OsX Device Profile
Creates a Provisioning Enabled QNX Device Profile
Creates a Windows PC Device Profile
Creates a Windows Desktop Device Profile
Creates a Windows Phone Device Profile

put.summary:
Updates an ANDROID Device Profile.
If the CreateNewVersion key is empty or false, a new Profile version will not be created but AssignedSmartGroups, RootLocationGroup, AssignedGeofenceArea and AssignedSchedule will be saved and published.
Else if it's true, new version of the profile will be created and published.

post.summary:
Updates an ANDROID Device Profile.
If the CreateNewVersion key is empty or false, a new Profile version will not be created but AssignedSmartGroups, RootLocationGroup, AssignedGeofenceArea and AssignedSchedule will be saved and published.
Else if it's true, new version of the profile will be created and published.

If the CreateNewVersion key is empty or false, a new Profile version will not be created but AssignedSmartGroups, RootLocationGroup, AssignedGeofenceArea and AssignedSchedule will be saved and published.
Else if it's true, new version of the profile will be created and published.

FileName.description: Gets or sets FileName {Will be set in the content-disposition header}

IRequestQuery.description:
Interface for IAwRequestQuery
This will hold all the required data for a request. Will be filled from ModelBinder

QueryParams.description: Gets or sets Query Parameters. For e.g. any query string parameters will be extracted to key,value pair and stored here.

TenantContext.description: Gets or sets IAwTenantContext. Will hold the tenant details, which will be filled as part of the tenant validation handler

RequestMethod.description: Gets or sets RequestMethod. Will be used to write custom rules

AllowedUriQueryChars.description: Gets or sets allowed Characters in Query String.

ITenantContext.description: Contract for TenantContext. Will be exposed from RequestQuery and will be injected to every controller actions and Business method

TenantCode.description: Gets or sets TenantCode. Uniquely identify the tenant for the request

OrganizationgroupId.description: Gets or sets Organization Group ID

ProfileList.description: Gets or sets List fo profiles.

AdditionalInfo.description: Gets or sets Hypermedia content for the result

ProfileId.description: Gets or sets Id of the Profile.

ProfileName.description: Gets or sets Name of the profile.

ManagedBy.description: Gets or sets the profile's Organization Group name.

OrganizationGroupId.description: Gets or sets the profile's Organization id

ProfileStatus.description: Gets or sets the status of the Profile.

Platform.description: Gets or sets the platform name of profile.

AssignmentType.description: Gets or sets profile Assignment Type.

AssignmentSmartGroups.description: Gets or sets Assignment Smart Groups.

ExcludedSmartGroups.description: Gets or sets Excluded Smart Groups.

Id.description: Gets or sets Id of the smart group.

Name.description: Gets or sets Name of the smart group.

Rel.description: Gets or sets the relational links.
